Class MatrixOperations

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.model.MatrixOperations
public class MatrixOperations extends Object
Provides utility methods for matrix operations in Tetris gameplay.

This utility class contains static methods for common matrix operations such as collision detection, merging pieces with the board, clearing completed rows, and copying matrices. All methods are stateless and thread-safe.

Functionality:

  • Detects collisions between pieces and the game board
  • Merges piece matrices with the board matrix
  • Identifies and removes completed rows
  • Creates deep copies of matrices for immutability

  • Method Details

    • intersect

      public static boolean intersect(int[][] boardMatrix, int[][] brickmatrix, int columnoffset, int rowoffset)
      Checks if a brick matrix intersects with the board or goes out of bounds.

      Collision occurs if any non-zero cell in the brick overlaps with a non-zero cell on the board or extends beyond the board boundaries.

      Parameters:
      boardMatrix - the game board matrix
      brickmatrix - the brick's shape matrix
      columnoffset - the brick's horizontal position on the board
      rowoffset - the brick's vertical position on the board
      Returns:
      true if the brick collides with the board or boundaries, false otherwise

    • copy

      public static int[][] copy(int[][] originalmatrix)
      Creates a deep copy of a 2D matrix.

      The returned matrix is completely independent of the original, allowing modifications without affecting the source.

      Parameters:
      originalmatrix - the matrix to copy
      Returns:
      a new matrix with the same dimensions and values as the original

    • merge

      public static int[][] merge(int[][] boardMatrix, int[][] brickmatrix, int columnoffset, int rowoffset)
      Merges a brick matrix into the board matrix at the specified position.

      Non-zero values from the brick overwrite corresponding positions on the board. The original board matrix remains unchanged.

      Parameters:
      boardMatrix - the game board matrix
      brickmatrix - the brick's shape matrix to merge
      columnoffset - the brick's horizontal position on the board
      rowoffset - the brick's vertical position on the board
      Returns:
      a new matrix with the brick merged into the board

    • checkRemoving

      public static ClearRow checkRemoving(int[][] boardMatrix)
      Checks for and removes completed rows from the board matrix.

      Completed rows (all non-zero values) are removed, and remaining rows are shifted down. The score bonus is calculated as 50 × (lines cleared)².

      Parameters:
      boardMatrix - the game board matrix to check
      Returns:
      a ClearRow object containing the number of lines removed, the updated board matrix, and the score bonus earned

    • deepCopyList

      public static List<int[][]> deepCopyList(List<int[][]> list)
      Creates a deep copy of a list of 2D matrices.

      Each matrix in the list is independently copied, ensuring complete isolation from the original list and its contents.

      Parameters:
      list - the list of matrices to copy
      Returns:
      a new list containing deep copies of all matrices
